thread.title: President Trump's shortsighted budget plan throwing away Great Lakes protections must not stand: Sam Speck (Opinion)
thread.title_full: President Trump's shortsighted budget plan throwing away Great Lakes protections must not stand: Sam Speck (Opinion)

author: Guest Columnist/cleveland.com
title: President Trump's shortsighted budget plan throwing away Great Lakes protections must not stand: Sam Speck (Opinion)
text: Conserving our nation's natural resources is not a luxury to be cut during difficult times. It is a cost-effective investment that generates impressive returns to all Americans, writes former Ohio Department of Natural Resources Director Sam Speck.
